title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby style.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with prompt history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI autocomplete via Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python RAG example using Ollama embeddings & Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for the Ollama REST API with async support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer-backed processes and telemetry.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) construct to provision Ollama on AWS EC2 with GPU.
